findings.message:
FindThisHash.solve(string) (FindThisHash.sol#14-19) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(1000000000000000000000) (FindThisHash.sol#18)
findings.name: arbitrary-send-eth

findings.message:
Deprecated standard detected require(bool)(hash == sha3()(solution)) (FindThisHash.sol#17):
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
findings.name: deprecated-standards

findings.message:
Version constraint ^0.4.22 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ABIEncoderV2PackedStorage_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- EventStructWrongData
	- OneOfTwoConstructorsSkipped.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.22 (FindThisHash.sol#7)
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: solc-0.4.26 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message:
solve(string) should be declared external:
	- FindThisHash.solve(string) (FindThisHash.sol#14-19)
findings.name: external-function
